Reviews.Title: I second the earlier reviewer. This is the best android in the market hands down!
Reviews.Author: saun
Reviews.Content: This is a very attractive looking phone. Slim, lightweight and with super features.Set up is almost instant. Just put in your simcard and you are automatically hooked on to  the network within a few seconds.Signal strength is great. Gets HSPDA+ on AT&T; and the call quality is crystal clear. Gets full signal bars most of the time.Never drops a call.Reception is even better than my old Samsung Galaxy S3 with 4glte.Battery life is super. I could download lots of applications, surf the net and make at least 100 calls and the battery life was intact.The 8MP main camera is absolutely clear. The auto focus and face detection works well.MMS is fully supported.Downloading apps is extremely fast and most useful apps are already installed.WIFI works at blazing speeds.The network data connection on AT&T; is a fast and consistent at great. speed.Has a built in FM TUNER as well. Videos plays well and the screen resolution great.The price is extremely reasonable for a high quality phoneIt comes with a great looking case and an extra battery.A big bonus!I recommend this to anyone looking for a graet phone at a great price.

Reviews.Title: No cases can fit this
Reviews.Author: C.Toussaint
Reviews.Content: Bought this for myself. Hooking it up to my service provider (metro pcs)  was easier than I thought, only issue is thati cannot find a case for it, cuz it's alot bigger than a s4, any suggestions are welcome.

Reviews.Title: Got H+(Hspda+) on AT&T;  the moment I got connected!
Reviews.Author: Regi Sylvain
Reviews.Content: Set up took a about 15 seconds after installing my AT&T; simcard.Yes all the bars popped up with H+ sign.This is a highly advanced 3G phone.I am surprised at one of the other reviews which complains of connectivity issues especially since for me the signal never dropped even once while I drove from Los Angeles to SanFrancisco and back.That makes it an extremely reliable phone with great connectivity with wifi and Bluetooth as well.Connects to my car Bluetooth almost instantly when I step in.The call quality is very clearThe looks are super and it it is lightweight.Main camera delivers very clear pictures.The battery life is good .Downloading apps is easy and the MTK 6572 does its job in keeping the phone fast all the time.Overall one of the best Androids in the market today for its price.The video streaming and integration with social accounts is one of its best features.Overall a great high end phone.

Reviews.Title: Great value phone
Reviews.Author: Jose A Rangel
Reviews.Content: I received my phone in a nice box well wrapped, at this moment I live in Venezuela. Set up was very clean and just took 35 seconds after installing the si card from Movilnet operator, then I installed another simcard from Movistar operator and it works very fine with both operatorsThe GPS. I followed the instructions from other customers and it works wellWIFI, I have two routers and it connected immediatelyI recommended this because looks as a great phone at a great price.Any problem I will write a review

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: stephron13
Reviews.Content: I received my phone in great condition even got it  a day earlier. It is bigger then I expected which isn't a bad thing. This phone was very easy to set up, all I had to do is put my T-Mobile sim card in it and it was ready to use. It even came with two batteries. They only problem I have is it won't read my SD card.

Reviews.Title: Started off great!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: At first sight this phone was a steal! I had fallen in love with it! Huge screen, great picture, latest operating system. Hooked the phone up to the AT&T; network and everything was great for about 12 hours. When I was driving all of a sudden the phone lost service. I thought nothing of it for about an hour when I realized that it was not getting service still. So I went to two different AT&T; stores to try and figure out what the heck was going on and no one could figure out why it refused to tap into the network. Everything was reading right the phone just refused to have service. I am now returning the phone to Amazon. This makes me sad because I had fallen in love with the Lightahead while it was working. I would check with your carrier before purchasing this phone to ensure that they are familiar with it so that they are able to trouble shoot any issues that might arise.

Reviews.Title: Great Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Dianna  Mills
Reviews.Content: At first it was a great phone and worked great! Til a few days later then it quit working. It was too slow to do anything with, I couldn't even unlock it. It kept rebooting too. But customer service was great! I emailed them then the next day I received a reply that I could return it. I returned it and got my full money back. Thanks for that, lightahead.

Reviews.Title: Generic Good phone and can be used in Venezuela, eye Guarantee
Reviews.Author: cnoblot
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately , the team came to me with problems on the touch screen, I found that apparently the screen as it works with a sensitive tactile system to heat the same cooled and so did not receive orders. I apply the remedy is to rub the screen several times with a cloth (my own shirt ) and this apparently ractive heat sensor that works immediately , this happens a lot in the mornings when the cell is kept idle for long.The phone is an economic team and has many features equipment Brands with high values ​​on the market, if it worked all perfectly will give it a 10 , however , with the problems presented I note that the warranty offered by sellers is not the most appropriate , is a repair and 30 days you own it again , not knowing if it really is your telephone or the same functions adecuamenteThis is in spite of the details a good team in Venezuela working with Local Operators , it is important to note that are generic phones that require the operator 's suitability for full operation

Reviews.Title: good phone
Reviews.Author: charles saylor
Reviews.Content: I thought the phone was bigger I liked the phone but i have big hands and needed a bigger phone but over all great phone

Reviews.Title: its stopped working
Reviews.Author: Shelia Windom
Reviews.Content: it was doing great for about 10+ hours then it just stopped and started rebooting. i am sending it back and ive got a refund. but im sad it did not work..

Reviews.Title: I Dlya. M New York Brooklyn
Reviews.Author: dilbar
Reviews.Content: this phone LAS20 3G Smart Phone 4GB Rom - 3G/4G on AT & T, 2G on T-mobile, works with all GSM networks free case (WHITE) I gave sister ana davolno very beautiful works very well recommend to friends

Reviews.Title: As advertised
Reviews.Author: Lee Romig
Reviews.Content: I use the phone in the USA with an ATT Go sim and in Australia with a Telstra sim and works great.

Reviews.Title: froze up after reboot
Reviews.Author: elizabeth stevens
Reviews.Content: The phone is absolutely gorgeous, and has some nice features. The camera cannot be 5 mp, the picture quality is too low, but overall a nice phone for the money. During the process of trying to set up the phone to receive network services (via Straight Talk) I ended up rebooting the phone twice. The second time I rebooted it the phone froze up and I couldn't do anything with it.

Reviews.Title: Phone did not work
Reviews.Author: M.A. Davis
Reviews.Content: I was so happy to recieve this phone! Straight out the box, its very big, pretty & doesnt feel cheap at all. However, when i tried charging the phone, it would not power on. I contacted the seller & i was told to charge the phone for 12hrs. So i let the phone sit on the charger for 12hrs & still no power. I even stuck the battery in a universal charger. No luck whatsoever :( I contacted the seller again & they told me i can return the phone for a refund & reorder it again. I think im going to just return the phone & not reorder :(

Reviews.Title: it's okay for the money
Reviews.Author: Michelle Ochs
Reviews.Content: This phone is okay for the money but it takes terrible pictures.  The battery life is pretty good as I don't charge it for 3 or 4 days and stays at 70%

Reviews.Title: Surprisingly, a great phone
Reviews.Author: r0dnt
Reviews.Content: Bought this phone for an overseas trip because it can handle multiple sim cards on multiple bands. It works very well. Three main problems: lag when swiping and tapping on the screen, GPS lost signal for a while,  and the included case is nice but it didn't stay stuck to the phone.

Reviews.Title: Excellent low cost phone
Reviews.Author: Gary
Reviews.Content: We got this as a replacement for my wife's last cheap phone.  She only accesses the internet over wifi, so this worked out perfect for her. It comes with a spare battery, but after several months we're not seeing any loss of charging power, and it can go a couple days between charges.  It comes with a "case" actually a cheap piece of plastic that sticks to the back and provides a flip cover for the front with a window to see the time.  No real protection at all, we threw it away.  It has comes with a screen protector film which we haven't used.

Reviews.Title: Worked for 2 Months
Reviews.Author: Michael D. Peters
Reviews.Content: I took a chance ordering this generic phone...regret it now. The phone worked fine out of the box, I have/had two issues:1) The phone ships with a leather case, but it is very simple...most will want a different case.  Due to the odd size of the phone (yes, it is slightly bigger than the Galaxy S4), I have been unable to find any alternate case that fits.2) Last week the phone began having problems, the screen is only partially responsive to touch.  I did some research which advised doing a factory reset...didn't help. Unfortunately, they only have a 30 day return policy.While it technically still works, the inability to navigate the touch screen without repeatedly touching an icon 6-7 times makes it a brick.  Looking for another phone now...perhaps it was just bad luck, gambled and lost $120.

Reviews.Title: bad experience
Reviews.Author: tiffany bush
Reviews.Content: Had problems wit finding who tha carrier was,had no directions how 2 work tha phn and I Cindy get or send picture messages...so I don't like tha generic  brand

Reviews.Title: don't buy
Reviews.Author: anahita
Reviews.Content: Loved it at first but then I realized what I bought. It slows down every two seconds and I have to erase everything to give it a boost. The cameras a joke, I don't use it. ID rather not have a phone. Returning this ASAP
